definitions.text: a reproduction of a written record (e.g. of a legal or school record)
a thing made to be similar or identical to another thing
examples: she made a copy of the designer dress
the clone was a copy of its ancestor

definitions.text: matter to be printed; exclusive of graphical materials
material suitable for a journalistic account

examples: The students were made to copy the alphabet over and over
Children often copy their parents or older siblings

definitions.text: reproduce or make an exact copy of
